name: Fromage and Goldie's 2021 Global Game Jam
name_original: Fromage and Goldie's 2021 Global Game Jam
description:
This was our submission to the 2021 Global Game Jam!

You are a new employee at the community center and its your job to find stuff around the center for your boss. Try to find as many objects as you can in 1 minute. Our high-score is 34.

Have fun!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to progress the menu
Mechanics Overview
  • Object descriptions are given to you via the UI
  • Pick up as many objects as you can in 1 minute by running into them
  • Push stuff out of the way if you have to!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Detailed Mechanics
  • Slight speed boost and hitstop after picking up an item
  • Movement speed and player mass (ability to push objects) increase slowly over time
  • Music volume increases slowly over time
